name: Flamer Recreated (2023)
description:
What is it?

I tried to recreate the first game I ever made in only 3 days! I made Flamer 3 years ago and I thought it would be fun to see if I could remake it, but better! 

Play the original game: https://mreliptik.itch.io/flamer

Controls

Keyboard

  • AD to move left and right
  • Shift to dash (use WASD to make a directionnnal dash)
  • Space to jump
  • Esc to pause

Gamepad

  • Joystick or Dpad to move
  • A to jump
  • B or X to dash (use joystick or dpad to make a directionnal dash)
  • Start to pause
